title: Formal testacy proceedings; written objections to
context: ยง560:3-404 Formal testacy proceedings; written objections to probate. Any party to a formal proceeding who opposes the probate of a will for any reason shall state in the party&rsquo;s pleadings the party&rsquo;s objections to probate of the will. [L 1996, c 288, pt of ยง1]
